name: get_last_5_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cryptoinfo.
Tool description: We collect news from more than 30 crypto/financial sources and process them using neural networks. We estimate news sentiment and uniqueness and provide text summarization along with other informative indicators.
API description: Fetches the last 5 news articles from the financial section.

content_type.description: The type of content to retrieve (e.g., 'application/json').
